entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 04:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -37.5°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -41.3°C
Wind: N 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few clouds. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
